## opacity variable

Porter-Duff opacity modifier. Multiplies alpha component of `src` with `t`<!-- -->, clamped to \[0..1\] range. Writes results to `out`<!-- -->, or if `null` modifies `src` in-place.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
opacity: (out: Color | null, src: import("@thi.ng/api").ArrayLikeIterable<number>, t: number) => Color
```
